verses.name: 1 Corinthians 14:20
verses.text: Brethren, be not children in understanding: howbeit in malice be ye children, but in understanding be men.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 14:21
verses.text: In the law it is written, With men of other tongues and other lips will I speak unto this people; and yet for all that will they not hear me, saith the Lord.

verses.name: 1 Corinthians 14:22
verses.text: Wherefore tongues are for a sign, not to them that believe, but to them that believe not: but prophesying serveth not for them that believe not, but for them which believe.
